General.Name: Petrichor Energy Inc
General.Description: Petrichor Energy Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and gas properties in the United States. Its properties portfolio includes Marble Falls prospect, Cobb #1 well, Garner # 2 well, and Hinson # 1 well located in Texas, as well as Verba Filed located in Mississippi. The company was formerly known as Odyssey Petroleum Corp. and changed its name to Petrichor Energy Inc. in March 2011. Petrichor Energy Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T5
